title: 305: Craig & Sadie Chat Spells, Tarot, and Getting Caught in a Rat Trap
itunes:title: 305: Craig & Sadie Chat Spells, Tarot, and Getting Caught in a Rat Trap
description:
Comedian Craig Conant is BACK Broads - and this time he brought his lady Sadie! They chat about the weird things they do at home, Craig getting followed, Sadie on mushrooms, and more! Then they dive into Sadie being a witch! They go over what it looks like, tips, love spells, and Sadie does a tarot reading for Craig, Jess, and Bekah! 

SADIE OLSON:

***Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/iamsadieolson/

***Podcast “Goddess Hangs”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/goddess-***hangs/id1544695240

***Basic Witch 101 Course: https://iamsadieolson.teachable.com/p/basic-witch-101

***Book an Intuitive Reading: https://form.jotform.com/203526730185049

***Book a Tarot Reading: https://form.jotform.com/203171031844142

CRAIG CONANT:

***Follow Craig on Instagram: @craigpconant

***Listen to his podcast “Community Service w/ Craig Conant": https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/community-service-with-craig-conant/id1441475405

***Check out Craig’s Stand Up Comedy Dates here: https://craigconant.com/#tour

***Purchase Craig’s merch here: https://craigconantstore.com/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***RELIEFBAND: go to RELIEFBAND.COM and use code CHATTY you’ll get 20% off + free shipping!

***TALKSPACE: go to TALKSPACE.COM and get $100 off your first month with code CHATTY***DAILY HARVEST: Go to DAILYHARVEST.COM/CHATTY to get up to $40 off your first box!

***PRETTY LITTER: go to PRETTYLITTER.COM and use promo code CHATTY for 20% off your first order!

***FORIA: get 20% off your first order at FORIAWELLNESS.COM/CHATTY or use code CHATTY at checkout!

***PELOTON: Go to ONEPELOTON.COM to learn more!

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
